name: The Boring Game (Alex Po)
description:
Hello, dear friend, I am The Boring Game, the game that overturns the cliches, instead of giving the ultimate gaming experience I want to give you a very boring experience.
I am most a real-life simulator but of course, life doesn't have to be this boring but sometimes it is, we all know how boring it is to be stuck in traffic, to wait for your order, or simply to watch the clock for a long time without doing anything.
Sometimes I am a simple fictional game.

NOW WITH BATTLE ROYALE MODE.

Easy to understand, easy to play, a few click away to get the hyped boring experience in a game, at least I hope so. ;)

Get bored simulator!
